price: 27. Ils ne prononcent pas (de verdicts) avant Lui, et ils n’agissent que par Ses ordres.
arabic: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُم بِأَمۡرِهِۦ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā yasbiqūnahu bil-qawli wahum bi-amrihi yaʿmalūna
